name: Shotgun Sounds: Gun Simulator
description:
Hold, charge, press the gun trigger, and enjoy real life gunshot sounds in Shotgun Sounds: Gun Simulator.

Shotgun Sounds: Gun Simulator is a safe gun-app simulator that helps you experience the feeling of using gun without any threat to anyone. Explore a wide collection of realistic and fake guns, listen to gun shooting sounds as well as other powerful weapons sounds to serve your passion for warfare and powerful weapons. You'll adapt to different shooting environments and become a gunshot sound enthusiast.

Enjoy the real life gunshot sounds and motions of your guns. Pick up your favorite gun and shoot your target now!

HOW TO PLAY:
💣 Scroll to choose the weapons on the home screen
💣 Tap to get gunfire or explosion sounds.
💣 Swipe to recharge
💣 Free to adjust:
- Select Gun Simulator Mode: Single Shot, Burst Mode, Auto Shot, and Shake
- Select Diversity Environment: Rain, Snow, Thunder

FEATURES:
🔫 Extremely smooth, responsive, and easy to use the sound of the gun app
🔫 Various powerful weapons collection from different categories: Pistol, machine, rifle, revolver, shotgun,...
🔫 Exciting gunshot gameplay sound of gun
🔫 Wonderful UI/UX of the sound of gun
🔫 High-quality shot animations like vibration during play sound of gun.
🔫 Thrilling Effects and Gun Sounds.
🔫 Best AI used for developing to make the more amazing sound of gun.
🔫 Increase your gun knowledge or use the sound of gun to prank your friends

Are you ready to become a gun master? Enjoy the realistic gunshot sounds. Download Shotgun Sounds: Gun Simulator and find out now!
